    • 请求并发控制
    • parseQueryString
    • promise.all

  • 数据结构与算法

参考文章：https://juejin.cn/post/6879332142854176776#comment (opens new window)

async function fn (urls, max = 1, cb) {
  const allReq = []
  const limitArr = []
  for (const key of urls) {
    const p = fetch(key) // 创建一个请求，返回promise
    allReq.push(p)
    if (urls.length > max) {
      const newP = p.then(() => {
        limitArr.splice(limitArr.indexOf(p), 1)
      })
      limitArr.push(newP)
      if (limitArr.length >= max) {
        await Promise.race(limitArr)
      }
    }
  }
  Promise.all(allReq).then(() => {
    cb()
  })
}
